scripts.git-deploy: git add . && node ../../gitpush/gitpush.js && git push && react-scripts build && firebase deploy
scripts.heroku-push: git add . && node ../../gitpush/gitpush.js && git push && react-scripts build && firebase deploy
scripts.git-init: git init && git add . && git commit -m "first commit" && git branch -M main && node ../../gitpush/gitinit.js && git push -u origin main
